name: Beyond Outbreak
description:
Control the virus to turn Miami into zombie's playground.

Nice sandbox mechanics. More than a thousand of citizens are simulated in real time. Virus evolution mini game.

Game is developed under Epic Mega Jam 22

99% of assets were created for this specific project

Unreal Engine 5.0.3 used

GTX 970 or above is recommended, though the game is pretty optimized.

Project team: Dmitriy Vasilyev, Dmitry Masloboev, Sergey Biryukov, Olga Romanchuk.
